product_name: Sierra Designs All Weather Rain Pants - Women's
long_description: The women's Sierra Designs All Weather Rain Pants feature durable, waterproof legs and an air-permeable upper, delivering crucial ventilation as you forge on in wet weather. Upper is breathable, stretchy nylon/spandex; seat and lower legs are waterproof, breathable polyester knit with a polyurethane laminate and durable water repellent finish. Soft, brushed interior enhances comfort. Wide contoured waistband is comfortable to wear with any pack, and has a snap front closure, zippered fly and belt loops. 24-in. side zippers allow easy on/off over boots. 2 built-in thigh pockets with zippers fit a folded map perfectly. Lightweight and durable, the women's Sierra Designs All Weather Rain Pants are trim-fitting and can be worn next to the skin and even under a skirt.
short_description: The women's Sierra Designs All Weather Rain Pants feature durable, waterproof legs and an air-permeable upper, delivering crucial ventilation as you forge on in wet weather.
